derivation: from G1 (ἄσπονδος) (as a negative particle) and a derivative of G4689 (ἄσπονδος);
strongs_def: literally, without libation (which usually accompanied a treaty), i.e. (by implication) truceless
outline:
1. without a treaty or covenant
    1. of things not mutually agreed upon e.g. abstinences from hostilities
  2. that cannot be persuaded to enter into a covenant, implacable
